extension.description: My Anonymous Friends Wizard was created to help the kodi community. Performs auto maintenance to keep your device running smoothly. Installs builds from The My Anonymous Friends Team. Installs Addons selected by the MAF Team.

extension.summary: Modded by KISAKUL...eXtended MOD of Confluence skin originally by Jezz_X and CCM by Mudislander.

extension.description: This skin is a mod of Xonfluence which is a MOD of Confluence to enable a greater degree of user customisation to the default skin (based by Mudislander's CCM).

extension.disclaimer: You break it - You get to keep the pieces

extension.summary: Kratos - God of War. This addon is open source. Use it as you wish. Dig into it, rip it up, chop it up, make it your own, and share it if you wish. FYI... I can and will do what I want with this addon. If you don't like that idea, simply uninstall and do not use it. You can contact me on Twitter: @_KISAKUL
extension.description: Kratos - Making your streaming experience better.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any content. Appreciation to SClarke for collaborating, troubleshooting, and learning with me.
extension.news: Kratos - The God of War. This addon is open source. I can and will do what I want with this addon. If you don't like that idea, simply uninstall and do not use it. Otherwise, Enjoy some great content!! You can contact me on Twitter: @_KISAKUL

extension.description: This Addon Will [COLOR lime]NOT[/COLOR] Delete Itself Unless You Have http://muckys.mediaportal4kodi.ml As A Source In File Manager.

extension.summary: Collection of modules used by Mucky Ducks Addons
extension.description: Collection of modules used by Mucky Ducks Addons beautifulsoup3 v3.2.1 from https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup : beautifulsoup4 v4.5.1 from https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup : cfscrape 1.6.8 from https://github.com/Anorov/cloudflare-scrape : incapsula-cracker v0.1.3 from https://github.com/ziplokk1/incapsula-cracker : Js2Py v0.40 from https://github.com/PiotrDabkowski/Js2Py : jsbeautifier v1.6.4 from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/jsbeautifier : jsunpack from urlresolver which is a modified script from jsbeautifier: md_request a simple script for making web requests : md_tools a script with common methods in the Mucky Duck addons : md_view a simple script for adding views to addons : requests v2.12.4 from https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests : six v1.10.0 from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/six : unshortenit v0.3.0 from https://github.com/jkehler/unshortenit :
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
